0111000001011101 1011000010110101 1 -> sum: 0010000100010011, cout: 1
1011110000001101 1000010010001001 0 -> sum: 0100000010010110, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
